publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4363 Tricia Marwick: Armed Forces Day—That the Parliament notes that 27 June 2009 has been designated Armed Forces Day, giving people across Scotland the opportunity to recognise the brave service of servicemen and women past and present; further notes that events will be taking place across Scotland, beginning in Fife on 13 June and with celebrations in Dundee, Aberdeen, Glasgow and Edinburgh on 27 June; welcomes the decision of the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body to fly the commemorative flag at the Parliament on Armed Forces Day and the efforts of councils and communities across the country to mark Armed Forces Day, and, in recognising the sterling work of serving personnel, urges people across the country to show their support for serving personnel and veterans.

S3M-4363 Tricia Marwick: Armed Forces Day—That the Parliament notes that 27 June 2009 has been designated Armed Forces Day, giving people across Scotland the opportunity to recognise the brave service of servicemen and women past and present; further notes that events will be taking place across Scotland, beginning in Fife on 13 June and with celebrations in Dundee, Aberdeen, Glasgow and Edinburgh on 27 June; welcomes the decision of the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body to fly the commemorative flag at the Parliament on Armed Forces Day and the efforts of councils and communities across the country to mark Armed Forces Day, and, in recognising their sterling work, urges people across the country to show their support for serving personnel and veterans. Supported by: Ken Macintosh*, John Lamont*, Christina McKelvie*, Kenneth Gibson*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Jackson Carlaw*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Hugh Henry*, Nigel Don*, Stewart Maxwell*, Stuart McMillan*, Murdo Fraser*, Michael Matheson*, Elizabeth Smith*, Nanette Milne*, Joe FitzPatrick*, John Scott*, Elaine Murray*, Liam McArthur*, John Park*, Margaret Mitchell*, Pauline McNeill*, Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-4363 Armed Forces Day (lodged on 11 June 2009) Mike Pringle*
S3M-4363 Armed Forces Day (lodged on 11 June 2009) Jack McConnell*
S3M-4363 Armed Forces Day (lodged on 11 June 2009) Karen Whitefield*, Dave Thompson*, Maureen Watt*
S3M-4363 Armed Forces Day (lodged on 11 June 2009) Cathy Jamieson*
S3M-4363 Armed Forces Day (lodged on 11 June 2009) David Stewart*
